title: Can we get a more serious Tahm Kench skin?
body:
Pretty much the title.
 
Can we get a Tahm Kench skin that isn't silly? Not that I'm ripping on the current ones, they are just all kind of light-hearted humor type skins. Maybe a serious one?

Namazu is the name of a catfish in Japanese myth that's so big that they blame him for giant earthquakes.

Tahm Kench IS kind of a fatty.

Maybe a neat conceptual idea that would click with a lot of the game's users? Give it a Japanese art twist or something. Dono. Figured if I could ask for something I should also have some input. Ultimately I don't care as long as it isn't silly.

That'd be nice. Thanks.

replies.body:
DUNKMASTER TAHM KENCH INC

{{item:1419}} {{item:3117}} {{item:3086}} {{item:3086}} {{item:3086}} {{item:3086}} {{champion:223}} 

PRO AS HECK
GET DUNKED
{{item:2049}} {{item:3117}} {{item:3086}} {{item:3086}} {{item:3086}} {{item:3086}} {{champion:223}} Here's the support build if you ever need one.
i wana see King Kench, where hes wearing the crown and cape of king tryn or king or clubs morde

I'd kill for a Devourer of Worlds Tahm Kench

I don't know what it would look like but it sounds hella cool

also Kirby Kench where his aesthetics change based on the last thing he ate. I realize that is impossible because it would have to be hotfixed with each new champion, rework, etc, but still awesome. Next ultimate skin?

April fools skin where he wears a {{champion:31}} costume


MUAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHHA I HAVE SPOILED YOUR SERIOUS SKIN!!!!!!!!!

except he already got an april fool's skin literally last year

I wouldn't be surprised if they did a leprechaun skin for him honestly
What about the Cheshire Cat Tahm Kench skin? An artist made a concept of that and now I want that skin, it would be so great!!

Great idea. Since it already uses that japanese concept, realising him as the namazu as part of the bloodmoon skin line would be great.
Maybe mix it up with some Sumo elements.
i think they fit Tahm really well since ..well he is a silly champion. Altough a more serous skin could be nice.
I want a really scary/brutal looking Tahm skin tbh

I'd just like it if Tahm Kench was a bit more viable before they start making cool skins for him. I'd like to see a Voidborn or Mecha skin for him, but there are better supports to play, so it wouldn't be worth buying.
Mecha would be GOD DAMN TERRIFYING. I feel like it would look like Mechanical Terror (I think thats its name im not a Smite player) Bakasura. He would be a big Washing Machine Shredder.
